<title level="1" right="Hazard 4" pfs="">[Steam Vents](/Hazards.aspx?ID=95)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Steam" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=415" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 81</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

Large pressurized pipes connected to a trip wire are rigged to release a blast of steam on trespassers.

---

**Stealth**
DC 22 (trained)

**Disable**
[Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) DC 22 (trained) to disconnect the trip wire or [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) DC 24 (expert) to carefully reduce the pressure and prevent the blast

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 20, **Fort** +12, **Ref** +12

**Hardness**
12

**HP**
48 (BT 24)

**Immunities**
object immunities

</column>

**Steam Blast** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The trip wire is pulled or severed, typically because a creature walked through the square with the trip wire; **Effect** Steam erupts from the pipes, dealing 3d6 bludgeoning damage and 3d6 fire damage (DC 24 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save) to all creatures within 15 feet. Creatures that critically fail their save are knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).
